snippet.title: Deadly Disco Trailer - Playdate
snippet.description:
This is the 2nd game I created for the Playdate Handheld.

Link to game: https://grhmhome.itch.io/deadly-disco

In this game, you must move on the dance floor to gain points. There are four stages to choose from and 3 songs to choose from.  If you choose a faster speed, you gain points more quickly, but the floor falls more quickly too. If you fall, it's game over!

Now... are you ready to boogy?

This channel is not affiliated with the games and/or developers I feature on this channel except my own games. This channel is not affiliated with Playdate or Panic.

Link to the Playdate website: https://play.date/
